body: I am having really bad lag lately and the lag was only on this sever so i was wondering if it was sever lag. If not can you tell my some things that can make this lag go away?
body_tagged: I am having really bad lag lately and the lag was only on this sever so i was wondering if it was sever lag. If not can you tell my some things that can make this lag go away?
title: Dumb Sever Lag?

replies.body: it was lagging so bad it closed my minecraft
replies.body_tagged: it was lagging so bad it closed my minecraft

replies.body: Could be you or the server thats getting a bad connection and getting a bit or a lot of lag. Ask people if they are lagging next time you lag, a great way to find out whether it's the server that is lagging.
replies.body_tagged: Could be you or the server thats getting a bad connection and getting a bit or a lot of lag. Ask people if they are lagging next time you lag, a great way to find out whether it's the server that is lagging.
